item.title: Getting Started with SignalR using F# and OWIN
item.description: SignalR allows us to easily push messages back and forth between a client (usually a website) and server using websockets. All of the pain of creating a connection, keeping the connection alive, reconnecting, serialising and deserialising messages, plus lots, lots more is taken care of for you. In this post we’re going to create a SignalR server and push some messages back and forth from a website. You can see the completed source at github.
